subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: The yearlong celebration of Justin Rose’s United States Open victory, the high mark of which was his recent return to Britain with the trophy, has been sweeter because of the decade of disappointments that preceded it.
snippet: The yearlong celebration of Justin Rose’s United States Open victory, the high mark of which was his recent return to Britain with the trophy, has been sweeter because of the decade of disappointments that preceded it.
